FlexiPage.description: Layout used by the Post Closing team for a Term Loan.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
ACCOUNT IN LITIGATION


This deal has been identified in association to an investigation. It requires that we preserve all relevant information in connection with the Account, Contact, and/or Deal information. Please do not delete or modify information related to this Account, Contact(s), and/or Deal(s)

 

In addition, please do not discuss the investigation with contacts from this deal should he/she contacts you in connection to details associated to this account.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Account In Foreclosure -- REFER TO ASSET MANAGEMENT

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Do Not Lend

This Account has been tagged as "Do Not Lend". For further details, please refer to Legal Team or Executive Team Member. Check the Notes Tab on the Account as it may also contain details regarding the reason.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Borrower (Entity)
    • This entity is a Delaware limited liability that is set up as the owner of the properties that are being financed and debtor in our financing.


  • ﻿Sponsor (Individual)
    • This individual is often times the Applicant. They are also often time the primary point of contact during our financing. Another good way to think of the Sponsor is as a principal in the transaction, especially when the Guarantor is an entity. They are always involved in the equity of the organizational structure. The Sponsor may also be our Guarantor. We will pull credit on any Sponsor that has 20% or more of an equity interest in the borrower entity or has an control over the borrower entity, ie directors of the borrower entity.


  • Guarantor (Individual or Entity)
    • This individual or entity is who provides the the recourse or non-recourse guaranty in our financing. They will always have some equity in the borrower entity. It is often time used synonymously with Guarantor. 


  • Pledgor (Individual or Entity)
    • This individual or entity is the sole member of the borrower entity. Often times they are also the Sponsor of the transaction and may also be the Guarantor, when they are an individual.


  • Vendor (Entity)
    • The entities that provide the diligence services for our financings.


  • Portal Access (Individual)
    • The individual for which we provide SF access that will be assisting in the uploading of diligence documents.


Example Org Chart

﻿

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note: Properties will only show up here if the address varies from the validated address. As you merge the data, the properties will be removed from the list.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note: Only SFRs, Condos and Townhomes will show up to pull RedBell data. Multi Units will not show up.

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Property Level Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Document_Type__c LIKE '%IC Memo%' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Background and Credit Search' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Portfolio Level Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Principle Loan Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Recorded Loan Documents' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'Current Vested Owner' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Section__c = 'DS Funding Package' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Document_Type__c LIKE '%Term Sheet%' AND Is_Deleted__c = false
